name: the visitor lobby plaza
desc:
You emerge from the lobby building into the heat of the island.  The jungle around this complex seems to have grown faster than the maintenance crews could trim it.

A tattered banner draped accros the from of the visitor center reads: 
      {#red}{%black}D-no.aur Out*.c,k ,Adve*.,r,{#reset}{%reset}.

You are starting to wonder where all the tourists are.

contents.name: bloody boot
contents.desc: Someone has forgotten their sho... wait.. is that a severed foot?
